bug.author: esimov
bug.description:
This is actually not an issue, but a notice that gocv.NormMixMax const in fact should be gocv.NormMinMax to get aligned with the standard OpenCV NORM_MINMAX enum type. Here is the reference for it: <denchmark-link:https://docs.opencv.org/master/d2/de8/group__core__array.html#gad12cefbcb5291cf958a85b4b67b6149f>https://docs.opencv.org/master/d2/de8/group__core__array.html#gad12cefbcb5291cf958a85b4b67b6149f</denchmark-link>
It's just a bit confusing.

comments.comment: That looks like a typo bug to me. Thanks for pointing that out, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/esimov>@esimov</denchmark-link>
This has been corrected in the dev branch. I will close this issue on next release.
This has been released as part of v0.16.0 thank you.
